sentences.en: A scholastic program primarily for seniors; a primarily middle - class neighborhood.
sentences.cn: '主要'.''为高年级学生开设的教育''.'课程'.''; ''.'主要'. ''居民为中产阶级的居住区.

sentences.en: A scholastic work is to have a useful bibliography at the end of each chapter or the whole book.
sentences.cn: 学术著作应该在每一章或全书之后附有一份参考书目.

sentences.en: After liberation the scholastic circles denominate this crop of common vegetable - fruit as Doushu in Chinese language.
sentences.cn: 建国后,学界把该常见蔬莱 - 水果作物定名为豆薯.

sentences.en: All the scholastic subtleties have neither added anything to nor subtracted the acuteness of this paradox.
sentences.cn: 这一矛盾之敏感,所有经院式的微妙都无法增减半分.

sentences.en: He is unfitted for scholastic life.
I like looking at scholastic magazines.
I was a regular tournament player in the Atlanta area, in both adult and scholastic tournaments.
sentences.cn: 我成为亚特兰大地区的参赛棋手, 无论成人赛和学生赛都不放过.

sentences.en: Left - brain scholastic subjects focus on logical thinking, analysis, and accuracy.
sentences.cn: 左大脑学术科目集中在逻辑思维, 分析和准确性.

sentences.en: Schools focus on scholastic and professional skills, but not on financial skills.
sentences.cn: 学校教育只专注于学术知识和专业技能的教育和培养, 却忽视了理财技能的培训.

sentences.en: The near future has scholastic ground SCP standard, put forward oligopoly Fan Shi.
sentences.cn: 近期有学者根据SCP标准, 提出了寡头垄断范式.

sentences.en: Then , it assesses the scholastic research on different schools, authors and other cases.
sentences.cn: 其二, 评判学界关于学派 、 学人及其他个案研究之得失.

sentences.en: There was a careful avoidance of the sensitive topic in the scholastic circles.
sentences.cn: 学术界小心地避开那个敏感的话题.

sentences.en: We faced keen competition in intra - scholastic basketball games.
sentences.cn: 我们面对著竞争激烈的校内篮球赛.

sentences.en: Within months , however, her scholastic aspirations were subsumed by dreams of carving out a music career.
sentences.cn: 然而数月后, 学业上的理想就被在音乐天地里闯番事业的梦想同化了.

sentences.en: Your mother joins with me in congratulating you on your wonderful scholastic attainments.
sentences.cn: 你母亲和我一道祝贺你学业上的巨大成就.
